subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mariano Rivera, the Yankees’ longtime closer, specializes in only one pitch and throws just one inning at a time. More notable, he has allowed only one base runner per inning in his career.
snippet: Mariano Rivera, the Yankees’ longtime closer, specializes in only one pitch and throws just one inning at a time. More notable, he has allowed only one base runner per inning in his career.
